title: Database Schema Design and Migration Setup
description: Create database migrations for multi-tenant architecture including organizations table, users table with tenant relationships, roles and permissions tables. Set up foreign key constraints and indexes for optimal performance. Include soft deletes and timestamps.

title: Core Models and Relationships Implementation
description: Implement Laravel Eloquent models for Organization, User, Role, and Permission with proper relationships, scopes for tenant isolation, and model factories for testing. Include validation rules and attribute casting.

title: Multi-Tenant Middleware and Service Layer
description: Develop tenant resolution middleware to identify current tenant from subdomain/domain, implement tenant scoping service to automatically filter queries by tenant, and create tenant switching functionality for admin users.

title: Authentication System with Role-Based Access Control
description: Implement Laravel authentication with custom guards for multi-tenancy, role-based authorization using policies and gates, password reset functionality scoped to tenants, and API token authentication for future API access.

title: Filament Admin Panel Integration
description: Set up Filament admin panel with tenant-aware resources for managing organizations, users, and roles. Create custom login page, dashboard with tenant-specific data, and navigation menu with proper permission checks.

title: Comprehensive Testing Suite
description: Write unit tests for models and services, feature tests for authentication flows and tenant isolation, create test database seeders for different tenant scenarios, and implement automated testing for role-based access control.
